title: Clinical significance of 12-lead electrocardiogram QRS scores on admission in ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction
details: K Tsutsumi, K Okada, Y Hanajima, H Kirigaya, M Horii… - European Heart Journal, 2024
abstract: Background A QRS scoring system by 12-lead electrocardiography (ECG) is a quick and simple method to evaluate degree and extension of myocardial infarction. Previous studies have shown that high QRS scores (≥ 5) at hospitalization (before …
